name: Moonbase Down
description: Enter a fearful Sci-Fi jaunt into a procedurally generated Moonbase. Rescue Jonesy the cat and avoid the woes of Alien impregnation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or better Graphics: 512MB Video Memory or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or better Graphics: 512MB Video Memory or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit or better
